name: PAPERTIME
description:
The Experimental AI in Games workshop is a relaxed academic event that happens just before the AIIDE Conference. It's happening again this October, and we want you to submit a paper, a demo or a tutorial about something cool you've done, written about or thought about. Indies, artists and other non-academics are also very welcome!

You can find out more about us online at www.exag.org. We try to be a different kind of academic event, and one of the sillier ways we do this is to make little games to advertise our workshop. This year it's a parody of BurgerTime - make papers by walking over section headers to line them all up and submit them to EXAG.

If you don't fancy downloading it, you can play the game online by clicking here!

If you have any questions, you can ask us on Twitter - @zookae, @sentientdesigns and @mtrc. <3
